text: Pendlebury is an electoral ward of Salford, England. It is represented in Westminster by Rebecca Long-Bailey MP for Salford and Eccles. A profile of the ward conducted by Salford City Council in 2014 recorded a population of 13,434. == Councillors == The ward is represented by three councillors: * Sophia Linden (Lab) * John Ferguson
